name: 17 Grand Dad
description:
From a idea to a Bootleg... This corrupted mario figure has one place to go... 3D!

Experience new mechanics and puzzles unlike the original game!
17 Grand Dad was created to celebrated 10+ years of Grand Dad! On to more Grandness!

Current Version : World 1 Demo
Planned Worlds : 4 Main Worlds.
Planned Levels : 5 Boss Levels (1 Per Each World and a Final Boss), 9 "Regular" Levels.
